爆煲.en: (adj.)(v.) used when a secret is exposed; used when a person cannot tolerate something, such as stress, workload, debt etc, anymore; to go over the limit.

祝捷.en: (verb) to party or celebrate a triumph or a victory

立品.en: (verb) to build a moral conduct; set up great behaviours

糖不甩.en: glutinous rice balls with peanuts and sesame

罷就.en: a way of saying: "so be it"

老翻.en: (n.) refers to illegal ,  pirated copies of something, such as CDs or handbags; (adj.) to describe something that is counterfeited

聲大夾冇準.en: Describes a person who speaks loudly (normally in an argument) but does not really have a point; full of hot air

茶煲.en: (n.) a tea pot; a tea kettle; (slang) a way to refer to someone who is troublesome

蕩平.en: To mop up and quell; to suppress and wipe out; to clear away; to sweep off

虎落平陽被犬欺.en: A man who loses position and influence may be subjected to much indignity

該釘就釘，該鐵就鐵.pinyin: goi1 deng1 zau6 deng1 goi1 tit3 zau6 tit3

貴姓名.en: (used in asking politely for) one's name

賴地硬.en: (to blame the land for being hard); to make excuses and deny one's responsibility; a bad workman blames his tools

贈言.en: words of advice or encouragement given to someone

跟尾狗.en: (n.) a person who copies other people's work or behaviour (with a negative connotation); a copycat; an obsequious follower.

返夜.en: to work on the night shift

送殯.en: to attend a funeral; to take part in a funeral procession

通論.en: the general theory of something; the General Theory (The General Theory of Employment, Interest and Money)

選材.en: to select a suitable material; the material selection

銜冤.en: to harbour a simmering sense of injustice or being wrongly charged

雜柴.en: mixed firewood (inferior quality to pine firewood)

雲城區.en: Yuncheng District, a district in Guangdong, China

頂癮.en: interesting; to satisfy a craving ,  addiction temporarily

飲家.en: an oenophile; a wine lover who is a connoisseur of fine wines

香港動漫電玩節.pinyin: hoeng1 gong2 dung6 maan6 din6 wun6 zit3

騎馬找馬.en: literally: 'to look for a horse while sitting on one', to hold on to one job while seeking a better one (dated meaning); nowadays more commonly used to describe someone who is out looking for something elsewhere despite already having it in their possessions or within their reach

屐.en: (adjective) (figurative) Work too hard (with feeling of dejected)

一抽二ｌｕｎ.en: to be carrying many bags; having many kids that one is responsible for, carrying one in one hand, holding another in another hand [colloquial]

下星期見.en: see you next week [written and colloquial]

依依鵝鵝.en: to babble on; to be longwinded; to go on and on; to complain continuously [colloquial]

初見.en: to see for the first time [written and colloquial]

唔係呀嗎.en: surely it can't be; it can't be true, can it?; you must be kidding; you gotta be serious; seriously? you got to be kidding!; really? That can't be! [colloquial]

唔好豬噏.en: don't talk rubbish; stop talking nonsense; don't bullshit [colloquial]

嗱屎上身.en: asking for trouble; to bring trouble upon oneself [colloquial]

屌你鹵味.en: euphemism for 'fuck your mother', foul language insulting one's mother when cursing someone [colloquial]

打睡.en: to go to sleep [written and colloquial]

拍拍屁股.en: to casually walk away as if nothing has happened; to wash one's hands off something; to walk off and just leave the mess for someone else to deal with [colloquial]

招𠔊買馬.en: to call on fellow members for support to strengthen one's forces; to get backup ready for a conflict [colloquial]

斬開九碌.en: to chop someone up to pieces [colloquial]

條脷無毛.en: euphemism for '你老母', 'fuck your mother'. foul language insulting one's mother when cursing someone [colloquial]

橫屍街頭.en: to be found dead in the street [written and colloquial]

爆大冷.en: a totally unexpected result in a match with the most unlikely winner going through [written and colloquial]

省招牌.en: to bring honour ,  credit upon an affiliated society and boosting its reputation [colloquial]

縮番條槓.en: to chicken out; to go back on one's word [colloquial]

老坑婆.en: a derogatory term to address an old woman [colloquial]

茄醬.en: tomato ketchup; tomato sauce [written and colloquial]

超住.en: to keep watch on something or someone [colloquial]

過早下結論.en: to jump to conclusions [written and colloquial]

醒醒定定.en: better watch out!; better be careful!; wise up!; pay attention! (given as an advice or warning) [colloquial]

金梳.en: literally: golden comb; come ashore (loanword) [written and colloquial, uncommon]

開晒巷.en: something that has been made known to everyone [colloquial]

響朵.en: to reveal one's identity or to invoke the name of one's triad big brother or boss in order to get protection or to make an impression [colloquial]
